languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит долгое время, вглядываясь в лицо стоящего напротив провидца. Он спокоен и собран и, кажется, готов принять свою судьбу. Наконец, Ирлиэт отвечает:{/n} "Ты прав, элантах. Мы оба виновны и оба заслуживаем участи многим ужаснее смерти. Однако нам слишком рано покидать этот мир, не искупив свою вину".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит долгое время, вглядываясь в лицо стоящего напротив провидца. Он спокоен и собран и, кажется, готов принять свою судьбу. Наконец, Ирлиэт отвечает:{/n} "Ты прав, элантах. Мы оба виновны и оба заслуживаем участи многим ужаснее смерти. Однако нам слишком рано покидать этот мир, не искупив свою вину".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. We are both guilty and both deserve a fate much more terrible than death. However, it is too early for us to leave this world before we have atoned for our guilt."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит долгое время, вглядываясь в лицо стоящего напротив провидца. Он спокоен и собран и, кажется, готов принять свою судьбу. languages.text: {n}Yrliet permanece en silencio durante un largo rato, escudriñando el rostro del vidente que tiene delante. Está tranquilo y sosegado, dispuesto a afrontar su destino. Finalmente, Yrliet responde.{/n} «Tienes razón, elantach. Ambos somos culpables y ambos merecemos un destino mucho peor que la muerte. Sin embargo, aún es pronto para que abandonemos este mundo; antes hemos de expiar nuestra culpa».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. We are both guilty and both deserve a fate much more terrible than death. However, it is too early for us to leave this world before we have atoned for our guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet permanece en silencio durante un largo rato, escudriñando el rostro del vidente que tiene delante. Está tranquilo y sosegado, dispuesto a afrontar su destino. Finalmente, Yrliet responde.{/n} «Tienes razón, elantach. Ambos somos culpables y ambos merecemos un destino mucho peor que la muerte. Sin embargo, aún es pronto para que abandonemos este mundo; antes hemos de expiar nuestra culpa».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは長く沈黙したまま、向かいに立つ先見司の顔をじっと見ている。落ち着いた様子の先見司は、自分の死を覚悟しているようだ。{/n}最後にユリエットは答えた。「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。我々はどちらにも罪があり、ゆえにどちらも死よりずっと恐ろしい罰を受けるべきなのだ。だが、この世を去るのは、罪を償ってからでも遅くはない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. We are both guilty and both deserve a fate much more terrible than death. However, it is too early for us to leave this world before we have atoned for our guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは長く沈黙したまま、向かいに立つ先見司の顔をじっと見ている。落ち着いた様子の先見司は、自分の死を覚悟しているようだ。{/n}最後にユリエットは答えた。「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。我々はどちらにも罪があり、ゆえにどちらも死よりずっと恐ろしい罰を受けるべきなのだ。だが、この世を去るのは、罪を償ってからでも遅くはない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了很长时间，凝视着站在她面前的先知，而先知镇定自若，似乎已准备好迎接自己的命运。到最后，伊莉耶特开了口。{/n}“你说得没错，外界人。我们都是罪人，都该遭受比死亡更可怕的命运。然而，现在就离开这个世界还为时过早，我们还没有偿清我们的罪过。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. We are both guilty and both deserve a fate much more terrible than death. However, it is too early for us to leave this world before we have atoned for our guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了很长时间，凝视着站在她面前的先知，而先知镇定自若，似乎已准备好迎接自己的命运。到最后，伊莉耶特开了口。{/n}“你说得没错，外界人。我们都是罪人，都该遭受比死亡更可怕的命运。然而，现在就离开这个世界还为时过早，我们还没有偿清我们的罪过。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet garde le silence un long moment, scrutant le visage du Grand Prophète qui lui fait face. Calme, il semble prêt à accepter son sort. Enfin, Yrliet répond :{/n} « Vous avez raison, elantach. Nous sommes coupables, vous et moi, et nous méritons un sort bien plus terrible que la mort. Mais, nous ne pouvons quitter ce monde avant d'avoir expié nos péchés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. We are both guilty and both deserve a fate much more terrible than death. However, it is too early for us to leave this world before we have atoned for our guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet garde le silence un long moment, scrutant le visage du Grand Prophète qui lui fait face. Calme, il semble prêt à accepter son sort. Enfin, Yrliet répond :{/n} « Vous avez raison, elantach. Nous sommes coupables, vous et moi, et nous méritons un sort bien plus terrible que la mort. Mais, nous ne pouvons quitter ce monde avant d'avoir expié nos péchés. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Lange schweigt Yrliet und blickt ins Gesicht des Runenpropheten ihr gegenüber. Angesichts seines Schicksals wirkt er ruhig und gefasst. Schließlich antwortet Yrliet:{/n} "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Wir sind beide schuldig und verdienen ein viel schlimmeres Schicksal als den Tod. Für uns ist es aber noch zu früh, diese Welt zu verlassen, da wir noch für unsere Schuld sühnen müssen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. We are both guilty and both deserve a fate much more terrible than death. However, it is too early for us to leave this world before we have atoned for our guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lange schweigt Yrliet und blickt ins Gesicht des Runenpropheten ihr gegenüber. Angesichts seines Schicksals wirkt er ruhig und gefasst. Schließlich antwortet Yrliet:{/n} "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Wir sind beide schuldig und verdienen ein viel schlimmeres Schicksal als den Tod. Für uns ist es aber noch zu früh, diese Welt zu verlassen, da wir noch für unsere Schuld sühnen müssen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, uzun bir müddet sessiz kalıyor. Dikkatle karşısında duran Ötesezen'in yüzüne bakıyor. Sakinleşip kendine gelen Ötesezen, kaderine boyun eğmeye hazır duruyor. Yrliet, en sonunda yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Haklısın elantach. İkimiz de suçluyuz ve ölümden de beter bir kaderi hak ediyoruz. Ancak bu dünyadan ayrılmamız için henüz çok erken. Önce kefaretimizi ödemeliyiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet stays silent for a long time, peering into the face of the Farseer standing across from her. Calm and collected, he looks prepared to meet his fate. Finally, Yrliet replies,{/n} "You are right, elantach. We are both guilty and both deserve a fate much more terrible than death. However, it is too early for us to leave this world before we have atoned for our guilt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, uzun bir müddet sessiz kalıyor. Dikkatle karşısında duran Ötesezen'in yüzüne bakıyor. Sakinleşip kendine gelen Ötesezen, kaderine boyun eğmeye hazır duruyor. Yrliet, en sonunda yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Haklısın elantach. İkimiz de suçluyuz ve ölümden de beter bir kaderi hak ediyoruz. Ancak bu dünyayı terk etmemiz için henüz çok erken. Önce kefaretimizi ödemeliyiz."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
